title: kaashI vishaalaakshim bhajEham
sahitya: kASI viSAlAkshIm bhajEham bhajE SrIanupallavikASI viSvESvara manOllAsakAriNImkaruNArasa laharIm guruguuha viSvAsinImcaraNamkAsIpuravAsinIm kAmita phaladAyinIm kalikalmashanAsinIm gandharvaghOshita gamagakriyA mOdinImpAsamOcanIm kapAlaSUlinIm pannagavENImdAsajana mukundavara pradAyinIm
